articles.author: Aisha Malik
articles.title: Instagram teases AI tools for editing appearances, backgrounds in videos using prompts - TechCrunch
articles.description: Instagram head Adam Mosseri has teased an upcoming generative AI feature that will let users "change nearly any aspect" of their videos.
articles.content: Instagram head Adam Mosseri is teasing upcoming generative AI features for the social app that will allow creators to “change nearly any aspect” of their videos using text prompts. The editing tools … [+1837 chars]
